author: Edwin Torres
text: , is a poet for all poets
to be an edwin for all edwins
, then there is only one of you
but one is too many for all
, then how can this one be for all
when that one is truly for truly’s sake
It isn’t a which or a what but a be
, to be a poet for poets
, then I have heard my entire life
, where there are so many to choose from
title: Merely a Poet
